product_name: Advanced Elements Hula Inflatable Stand Up Paddle Board with Pump - 8'
long_description: Unfold, inflate and hit the water in a matter of minutes. This Inflatable paddle board is only 8 ft. long and super lightweight, making it perfectly sized for petite and younger paddlers.
short_description: Unfold, inflate and hit the water in a matter of minutes. This Inflatable paddle board is only 8 ft. long and super lightweight, making it perfectly sized for petite and younger paddlers.
